Subject: CRITICAL LOW DISK SPACE
Description: In the control panel the message 3% free disk is displayed but no log can be deleted as it closes the session in 3 minutes. What is the procedure to solve this?
What_We_Know__c: After we had a remote session to analyze the disk usage we discovered that the file shadows accumulated and used more than 40% of the EPP Server's disk space.
Next_Steps__c:
In our remote session we extended customer's sda5 database partition with an additional 170 GB and after the procedure was completed they had 41% of disk space free.

We asked them to create a manual Audit Log Backup and ensure that the configurations matches and are identical to the example shown in the below screenshot.  They will need to wait for the process to complete and then allow at least 49 hrs for the audit log backup to complete.
Solution_Comment__c: The customer confirmed that the issue is resolved and requested case be closed.  This case is now closed.
